fields.title: Disposition
fields.desc: The system is no longer in use but is still deployed. It may still contain official data and records but no new data is being created or processed.

fields.title: Production
fields.desc: System is in use for critical mission activities

fields.title: Under Development
fields.desc: The system is being developed and may be in use for testing or demonstration purposes.

fields.title: Under Major Modification
fields.desc: The information system is undergoing a significant change. It is still in use for critical mission activities, but will need to be re-assessed.
